item.title: CVE-2021-24720|2024-08-03T19:42:16.664Z -- unknown -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%7C%20geodirectory
item.description: The GeoDirectory Business Directory WordPress plugin before 2.1.1.3 was vulnerable to Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
